description:
An exploration of the challenges that Ruby faces today, combined with ideas regarding how we can change things for the better. We'll talk about the language, its ecosystem and its community.

While on this bold adventure we'll plot a course towards Ruby 4.0 - a mystical and magical Ruby release that would ensure Ruby's dominance to infinity and beyond! Oh, and did I mention we'll have a ton fun while doing so? We'll most certainly do!
title: Ruby 4.0: To Infinity and Beyond - Bozhidar Batsov at Rails Israel V
